explains: v. （河流、道路等）蜿蜒，曲折前行；漫步，闲逛，徘徊；漫谈，闲聊；（文章）行文散漫
n. 河流（或道路）弯道，河曲；漫游

sentences.en: I liked to meander through familiar streets.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢闲逛穿过熟悉的街道。

sentences.en: They usually meander down to the pub after work.
sentences.cn: 他们通常下班后漫步到那家小酒店去。

sentences.en: Then I meander down to the freshly swept beach and join the others for dinner.
sentences.cn: 然后我款款走向新扫过的沙滩，和其他宾客一起去享用晚餐。
